page.title: 15SCHOOLS
page.content: The primary school closed some 15 years ago and the building is now used as a field study centre by colleges of education. All children travel into Appleby for education by the daily school bus. Of course, there are times in the winter when this cannot get through or days when the children are sent home early from school when heavy snow is falling. Winter weather is eagerly watched by local children! Ironically for the closed school there are now sufficient children in the villages to have warranted it staying open, and the Sunday School is well-attended. This is also an indication that the local population is not an ageing one. Secondary education is at the local comprehensive, Appleby Grammar School, further education in Kendal or Carlisle.
